DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_20_P03:

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e12ac70b3c9b46fcbe313dcaeb9d2db1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]好吧，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]既然你都这么说了，

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="df5a25c2ebde4a93a22824fa930acddb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]它是雪帕朵家代代相传的狗狗。[etc:Wait frame="8"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6e7c6ce7585244e69bfac296d0ead6a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]不过，和其他的宇宙犬相比，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9081763e649e45b5bb40691de739bb5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]不单是搬运能力，它还有着很强的挖掘力，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
